00026 $allModules['MySQL'] = 'mysqlDatabaseActions';
00027 if (function_exists ('mysql_connect')) {
00028         $availableModules['MySQL'] = 'mysqlDatabaseActions';
00029 }
00030 
00031 // for the tests
00032 $allModules['EXISTINGBUTNOTWORKING'] = 'EMPTY';
00033 
00034 if (! class_exists ('mysqlDatabaseActions')) {
00035         class mysqlDatabaseActions extends databaseActions {
00036                 var $dbName;    
00037         
00038                 function mysqlDatabaseActions () {
00039                         $this->setType ('MySQL');
00040                 }
00041         
00042                 function connect($host,$userName,$password) {
00043                         $this->connection = @mysql_connect ($host,$userName,$password);
00044                         if ($this->connection == false) {
00045                                 return "ERROR_DATABASE_CONNECTION_FAILED " . mysql_error ();
00046                         }
00047                 }
00048         
00049                 function selectDatabase ($dbName) {
00050                         $result = @mysql_select_db ($dbName, $this->connection);
00051                         if ($result == false) {
00052                                 return "ERROR_DATABASE_SELECTDB_FAILED " . mysql_error ();
00053                         }
00054                         $this->dbName = $dbName;
00055                 }
00056                 
00057                 function query ($sql) {
00058                         $result = mysql_query ($sql, $this->connection);
00059                         if ($result !== false) {
00060                                 return $result;
00061                         } else {
00062                                 return "ERROR_DATABASE_QUERY_FAILED " . mysql_error ();
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065                 
00066                 function numRows () {
00067                 }
00068                 
00069                 function fetchArray ($query) {
00070                         $var = mysql_fetch_array ($query);
00071                         return $var;
00072                 }
00073                 
00074                 function latestInsertID ($q) { 
00075                         return mysql_insert_id ($this->connection);
00076                 }
00077                 
00078                 function getAllFields ($tableName) {
00079                         $q = $this->query ("SHOW COLUMNS FROM $tableName");
00080                         if (! isError ($q)) {
00081                                 $allFields = array ();
00082                                 if (mysql_num_rows ($q) > 0) {
00083                                         while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc ($q)) {
00084                                                 $allFields[] = $row['Field'];
00085                                         }
00086                                 }
00087                                 return $allFields;
00088                         } else {
00089                                 return $q;
00090                         }
00091                 }
00092         }
00093 }
